tha-ap548:7.2: anantajinasaṃsari → anantajanasaṃsadi (bj) | anantajanataṃ sudhī (sya1ed, sya2ed) | anantajanataṃsarī (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap548:14.4: tayā santhuto → yo tava sāsane (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap548:15.1: homahaṃ vīra → tādisohaṃ mahāvīra (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
tha-ap548:24.2: nikkhamitvā agārato → nikkhanto pabbajitthaso (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap548:26.1: Isivhayaṃ gamitvāna → isivhayaṃ patanaṃ gantvā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap548:30.2: maṃ mahāparisāya so → mamāha purisāsabho (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
